These pants are great for night time walks the reflective edges look cool and I enjoy the amount of pockets on these. I am a fan of many pockets. The fitting was perfect as well. Good pants!

Got these for my fiancé and he loves them! The style is really trendy with the cargo pockets on the front and the reflective light stripe looks awesome under a flash! They fit him nicely and feel like nice material!

I had to order a larger size in these for my husband, and the XL works fine.  I wouldn't say they run small, possibly a little more fitted than other styles.  The fabric is very nice.  I think it would be somewhat wind repellent so they should be warm.  They have many pockets, and with the elastic waist, easy to put on.  They are a nice casual pant for around the house or going out.
Super confrontable and wash up just like they were brand new. I love these pants and have several pairs of them.

While these are stylish, there are some things I dislike about them. There is no way of wearing a belt with them. The pocket flaps have no way of being secured closed. Other than those things they are good pants. They fit well and are comfortable.
I purchased these for my partner and they love them. They fit perfectly and to size, they said that they are comfortable, and they are really great quality.
These fit true to size, the material is pretty good, very stylish and unique placement of the 3m, it really stands out

Nice lightweight material. These pants fit TTS- the elastic waist is great. Nice looking casual pants with reflective strips- great for at night. Pockets are good- there are two with zippers and two front pockets. The leg zippers are a nice feature.

评论概述: Fits well, Lots of Pockets and Possibilities
评论详情: Pants fit perfectly.  Really excellent elastic at the waistband.  Fabric is very nice to the touch & comfortable but a little stiff for easy movement.  (Probably be less stiff after washing.)  Pants are very good for a variety of casual wear activities.  The many pockets are handy & provide room to carry your cell, charger, wallet, keys, & much, MUCH more.  Reflective stripes on the legs are good for night wear or a different look at other times, like a good alternative to regular pants or sweats.  The zippers are a little stiff; could be better and smoother to use.  Maybe priced a bit too high.
